welcome_message_body: Welcome to Panama City, where the historic Casco Viejo meets the modern skyline. Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and delicious cuisine that this charming city is known for. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Panama City has to offer!

restaurants.name: Sea BreezE Barbeque

restaurants.address: 1139 N Tyndall Pkwy (highway 98), Panama City, FL 32404
